name: Basic
description: Perfect for beginners who just want access to gym equipment and a simple routine.
features: Open gym access during staffed hours

name: Standard
description: A balanced plan for regular gym-goers who want group activities and personal guidance.

name: Premium
description: Designed for fitness enthusiasts who want personal attention and complete facilities.

name: Annual Membership
description: Best value plan with year-round access, exclusive perks, and premium services.
